Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

The entities "J SC", "L", and "W" are all material properties in the context of the paragraph. "J SC" refers to the current density of the solar cells, "L" refers to the length of the devices, and "W" refers to the width of the devices.
